detectors.description: Contract Ethraffle_v4b (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#4-169) is not in CapWords

Reentrancy in Ethraffle_v4b.endRaffle() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#131-156):
	External calls:
	- contestants[i].addr.transfer(pricePerTicket) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#138)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- blockNumber = block.number (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#153)
	- gaps.length = 0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#154)
	- nextTicket = 0 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#152)
	- raffleId ++ (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#151)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RaffleResult(raffleId,totalTickets,address(0),address(0),address(0),0,0) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#142-150)
	- TicketRefund(raffleId,contestants[i].addr,i) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_052.sol#137)
